summary: Project to add ownership reset functionality, including an emergency reset code option in settings.

existing_features.title: Add an "Emergency Ownership Reset" option to the Admin Dashboard "Settings" tab that lets an admin enter an emergency reset code and trigger an ownership reset (calling the backend emergency reset API).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add ability to reset ownership, with an emergency reset code option in settings
After an emergency ownership reset, ensure previous admin roles do not continue to grant admin access; admin authorization must not fall back to legacy roles when no current owner is set.

projectName: Add emergency ownership reset option in admin settings and harden post-reset authorization
